error_details.explanation: Incorrect operation. The calculation should use '-' but used '+' instead.

context.question: N/A
context.flawed_solution:
#### 33
He loses 60*0.1=<<60*0.1=6>>6 bars to taxes
That means he has 60+6=<<60+6=66>>66 bars after taxes
So he has 66/2=<<66/2=33>>33 bars after the divorce
